summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling previous resolutions on Somalia, particularly resolution 2275 (2016),

Noting delays in Somalia's electoral process led to a deferral of the UN presence review,

Looking forward to the review report and recognizing the need for a short extension of UNSOM's mandate,

Decides to extend UNSOM's mandate as set out in paragraph 1 of resolution 2158 (2014) until 16 June 2017;

Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
